algorithms.compGeometry.convexHull

Class PolarAngleMergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.compGeometry.convexHull.PolarAngleMergeSort

  • public class PolarAngleMergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
    The algorithm uses a merge sort which has a worse case runtime is O(N * log_2(N)), but also includes an additional set of operations to remove inner points with the same polar angle from P0.
    Author:
    nichole
